  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105824</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">This Land is Your Land? This Land is My Land! Mapping the History of Territory Acquisition in the US</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Land ist Ihr Land? Dieses Land ist 
mein Land! Diagramm der Geschichte der Gegend-Datenerfassung in 
den US</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette terre est votre terre ? Cette terre 
est ma terre ! Tracer l'histoire de la saisie de territoire aux 
USA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta terra é sua terra? Esta terra é minha
terra! Traçando o history da aquisição do território nos E. 
U.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa terra è la vostra terra? Questa 
terra è la mia terra! Tracciato della storia di aquisizione del
territorio negli Stati Uniti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το έδαφος είναι το έδαφός σας; Αυτό το 
έδαφος είναι το έδαφός μου! Χαρτογράφηση της ιστορίας της 
απόκτησης εδαφών στις ΗΠΑ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Esta pista es su pista? ¡Esta pista es mi 
pista! Asociar la historia de la adquisición del territorio en 
los E.E.U.U.</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students will research the many territory acquisitions in United States history and create an annotated map that tells the history of U.S. expansion.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion erforschen Kursteilnehmer die 
vielen Gegenddatenerfassungen in der Vereinigte Staaten Geschichte und
stellen eine angemerkte Karte her, die die Geschichte der VEREINIGTE 
STAATEN Expansion erklärt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants rechercheront 
les nombreuses saisies de territoire dans l'histoire des Etats-Unis et
créeront une carte annotée qui indique l'histoire de l'expansion des
ETATS-UNIS.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes pesquisarão muitas 
aquisições do território no history unido dos estados e criarão um
mapa anotado que diga o history da expansão de ESTADOS UNIDOS.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi ricercheranno le 
molte aquisizioni del territorio in unito in Dichiara la storia
e creano un programma annotato che dice alla storia di espansione 
degli STATI UNITI.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές θα ερευνήσουν τις 
πολλές αποκτήσεις εδαφών στην Ηνωμένη ιστορία και θα 
δημιουργήσουν έναν σχολιασμένο χάρτη που λέει ιστορία της 
ΑΜΕΡΙΚΑΝΙΚΗΣ επέκτασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes investigarán 
las muchas adquisiciones del territorio en la historia de Estados 
Unidos y crearán una correspondencia anotada que diga la historia de 
la extensión de ESTADOS UNIDOS.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

        </lifeCycle>

    </metadata>
  </description>
